column2: # A: at least one die shows 1
# B: same number on the two dice
# C: both dice show odd numbers
P_AUBUC <- P_A + P_B + P_C - P_AB - P_AC - P_BC + P_AB  # = 2/3
# (5a) Venn diagram — render directly in RStudio Plots (no PDF)
area1 = 15, area2 = 5, area3 = 12,    # scale of probabilities *30
category = c("A: ≥ one 1", "B: same", "C: both odd"),
message("Install 'VennDiagram' to see the Venn plot: install.packages('VennDiagram')")

(polygon[GRID.polygon.1207], polygon[GRID.polygon.1208], polygon[GRID.polygon.1209], polygon[GRID.polygon.1210], polygon[GRID.polygon.1211], polygon[GRID.polygon.1212], text[GRID.text.1213], text[GRID.text.1214], text[GRID.text.1215], text[GRID.text.1216], text[GRID.text.1217], text[GRID.text.1218], text[GRID.text.1219], text[GRID.text.1220], text[GRID.text.1221])
